reviewText:
Hot Body Sneaky Preview 57 is fifty-seven minute long and was released on DVD on May 10, 2002. The best thing this DVD has going for it is Zdenka Podkapov who was Penthouse Pet of the Month for April 1998 and Penthouse Pet of the Year for 2001. You get to see early footage of Zdenka before her Penthouse years. The only other sexy lady is Felicity. BeBe, Cara, and Casey James look like your average third rate strip club girls. Here are the ladies as they appear in the following order.

Felicity-Starts off wearing white and blue lingerie and high heels; she ever so slowly becomes topless.
BeBe-Starts off wearing a black bra, skirt, and panties. She becomes topless very quickly in the segment and halfway into the segment she is fully nude.
Zdenka Podkapov-Zdenka looks like she is wearing a mini cheerleader outfit. Ina a matter of seconds she becomes topless and a few minutes later she is nude.
Cara-She is not that sexy and she wears and ugly outfit to match and also her tongue is pierced. A minute into the segment she is wearing nothing but a G-String and black high heels. About two minutes later she is naked.
Casey James-She starts off wearing and mini see through night gown; halfway into the segment she is undressed.

Also included in this DVD is Revealing Bonus of three of ladies that basically do the same thing as above. The worst thing about this DVD is the camera operator who does not get enough full body nude scenes of the ladies. Hot Body Sneaky Preview 57 gets a B+.
